entry.title: Fotor Photo Editor - Chengdu Everimaging Science and Technology Co., Ltd
entry.im:name: Fotor Photo Editor
entry.im:artist: Chengdu Everimaging Science and Technology Co., Ltd
entry.content:
Fotor Photo Editor
Chengdu Everimaging Science and Technology Co., Ltd
Genre: Photography
Release Date: 27 Mar 2013
© ¬© Everimaging,. Ltd

entry.title: Please add features ASAP if possible
entry.content:
Please add these features ASAP if possible to make it even better - cause these would help me soo much
1. Spraybrushes / arrows / etc
2. change collage background colors
3. more collage sizes ‚Äî 15 + photos, up from 9 photos limit for preset collages
4. newer preset collages / sizes ‚Äî more variants needed for each photo limits
5. newer option to make own collages with unlimited photos, cause the current version is too hard to use
6. options to change collage photos made / continue editing ones made - so you can change some photos and use others, instead of making new ones
7. options for photos so they dont reset sizes when changing locations in collages - stays the same size made in original position
8. options to auto fit photos into collage sizes if they are too big
9. options to change photo sizes within preset collages, so that they can be half / half (half photo up / half photo down next to eachother not opposite only), so you have options which way you want them to be displayed ‚Äî some of them already have this, but they dont let you adjust / change postions for photos which is an option which would be good to have available please
10. option to change text color (within same text field - not have to make different ones for each word, cause this process takes sooooooooooooo long
Thanks Fotor Photo Editor Teams

Please add features ASAP if possible

Please add these features ASAP if possible to make it even better - cause these would help me soo much

1. Spraybrushes / arrows / etc

2. change collage background colors

3. more collage sizes ‚Äî 15 + photos, up from 9 photos limit for preset collages

4. newer preset collages / sizes ‚Äî more variants needed for each photo limits

5. newer option to make own collages with unlimited photos, cause the current version is too hard to use

6. options to change collage photos made / continue editing ones made - so you can change some photos and use others, instead of making new ones

7. options for photos so they dont reset sizes when changing locations in collages - stays the same size made in original position

8. options to auto fit photos into collage sizes if they are too big

9. options to change photo sizes within preset collages, so that they can be half / half (half photo up / half photo down next to eachother not opposite only), so you have options which way you want them to be displayed
‚Äî some of them already have this, but they dont let you adjust / change postions for photos which is an option which would be good to have available please

10. option to change text color (within same text field - not have to make different ones for each word, cause this process takes sooooooooooooo long

Thanks Fotor Photo Editor Teams

entry.title: Can‚Äôt save any edited images
entry.content:
While the editing softwhere is certainly very basic, it isn‚Äôt terrible if you just want to crop, adjust some colours.
However, I‚Äôve tried several different images and tried changing the formate and quality of the file, but everytime I try to change anything, I get ‚Äúfailed to save‚Äù as a result, which makes it a bit pointless.

Can‚Äôt save any edited images

While the editing softwhere is certainly very basic, it isn‚Äôt terrible if you just want to crop, adjust some colours.

However, I‚Äôve tried several different images and tried changing the formate and quality of the file, but everytime I try to change anything, I get ‚Äúfailed to save‚Äù as a result, which makes it a bit pointless.

entry.title: Can‚Äôt paste a photo into the app
entry.content: Unlike the previous reviewer, I found the app installed easily and launched easily. However, when I tried to paste a picture into the editor, I found I could not do this. It only seems to allow opening an existing file, whereas I wanted to copy a picture from the web browser and save it as a suitably-sized file. No use to me, unfortunately! The advertising pop-ups are really annoying too!

Can‚Äôt paste a photo into the app

Unlike the previous reviewer, I found the app installed easily and launched easily.
However, when I tried to paste a picture into the editor, I found I could not do this.
It only seems to allow opening an existing file, whereas I wanted to copy a picture
from the web browser and save it as a suitably-sized file.
No use to me, unfortunately!
The advertising pop-ups are really annoying too!

entry.title: Wont load
entry.content: Downloaded this app as it sounded like it suited my needs but after trying to open it, which took two minutes to open and then continued to think for a further three minutes until I used force quit to get out, I tried again and no luck. FYI my Macbook Pro is only 9 months old and well taken care of so I doubt that the problem is on my end. I think this may be the first negative review I have written on the App Store‚Ä¶‚Ä¶..so that would be seven, eight years :( Apple needs a half star rating option or even better yet zero stars. I have since deleted it which funnily enough was a quicker process than trying to open this app.

Wont load

Downloaded this app as it sounded like it suited my needs but after trying to open it, which took two minutes to open and then continued to think for a further three minutes until I used force quit to get out, I tried again and no luck. FYI my Macbook Pro is only 9 months old and well taken care of so I doubt that the problem is on my end. I think this may be the first negative review I have written on the App Store‚Ä¶‚Ä¶..so that would be seven, eight years :(
Apple needs a half star rating option or even better yet zero stars. I have since deleted it which funnily enough was a quicker process than trying to open this app.

entry.title: what could change:
entry.content: i find this application entertaining and professional. not only is it productive, it enables so many reasonable options. but, with every good side of things there is usually a downside; like ice cream, yummy yet calorie-containing. i would love it if you could add images on top of images, like a photo with a logo/png on it. right now, it doesn‚Äôt have that, which kind of frustrates me. what i would love to see change, is that this app gets the feature of said proposal. besides that, it is wonderful.

what could change:

i find this application entertaining and professional. not only is it productive, it enables so many reasonable options. but, with every good side of things there is usually a downside; like ice cream, yummy yet calorie-containing. i would love it if you could add images on top of images, like a photo with a logo/png on it. right now, it doesn‚Äôt have that, which kind of frustrates me. what i would love to see change, is that this app gets the feature of said proposal. besides that, it is wonderful.

entry.title: Great
entry.content: I love this app! It‚Äôs a great editing software thats easy to use and it‚Äôs free. Some things that i would like are that you can enter fullscreen and also ive had some problems with when i enter the app the the click off it, then open it again, after a few times doing that all my desktop folders and applications disappear. They appear again when i restart my computer. Beside from that its a great app.

Great

I love this app! It‚Äôs a great editing software thats easy to use and it‚Äôs free. Some things that i would like are that you can enter fullscreen and also ive had some problems with when i enter the app the the click off it, then open it again, after a few times doing that all my desktop folders and applications disappear. They appear again when i restart my computer. Beside from that its a great app.

entry.title: Powerful and simple
entry.content:
Please bring in drag and drop images to the app itself instead of always opening them through browse. Makes everything so much easier. Also more features in the text area :)
Gets the job done with a simple UI and powerful effects. Very helpful with small and quick edits where you dont need to load a massive application. Well done!

Powerful and simple

Please bring in drag and drop images to the app itself instead of always opening them through browse. Makes everything so much easier. Also more features in the text area :)

Gets the job done with a simple UI and powerful effects. Very helpful with small and quick edits where you dont need to load a massive application. Well done!

entry.title: Unable to edit text size
entry.content: The App is fantastic i use it to edit all my photo‚Äôs. However i have recently needed to ad text to my photos which fotor gives you the ability to do. when i use the text section it doesnt allow you to choose your own size. this is very frustrating because the text becomes either too big or too small for what i need.

entry.title: Excellent for collage and adding text
entry.content: I needed an ap to compliment aperture and iPhoto which could create the occasional collage. It doesn't require you to have a university degree to use it! An added bonus for me is I can add text to photos. Very useful ap.

I needed an ap to compliment aperture and iPhoto which could create the occasional collage. It doesn't require you to have a university degree to use it! An added bonus for me is I can add text to photos. Very useful ap.

entry.title: Great Free App
entry.content: I like to try before I buy. Often free versions are very limiting. This app is very good and intuitive even in the basic mode. I have bought Photoshop on my Windows machines, but this is simpler and does a few very cool things.

Great Free App

I like to try before I buy. Often free versions are very limiting. This app is very good and intuitive even in the basic mode. I have bought Photoshop on my Windows machines, but this is simpler and does a few very cool things.

entry.title: love love love!
entry.content: For the longest time i have been looking for a good editing app for my mac, as i am part of many a fandom and find it hard to choose what photo i want for my desktop backgrund, with this app i can qute quickly fuse heaps of photos together, and it turns out pretty good. i really love this app, all my friends have downloaded it cause they all think its really frat and easier and faster than photoshop im stoked with this app and reccomend it to everyone :)

love love love!

entry.title: I can't live without Fotor now!!!
entry.content: I've been using Fotor for ages now, I recommend it to everyone I can, it's the most simple and easy to use photo app ever!!! I enhance all my photos before posting to Facebook now. Photo's taken on my iPhone seem dull unless I edit them in Fotor‚Ä¶ I have a very full Fotor folder in Finder, where I save all of my pics + collages! I can't fault this app whatsoever, it's sheer perfection. AND I've just discovered there's an iPhone app, I'm now in complete photo fun heaven lol‚Ä¶ Thanks Fotor, keep up the amazing work :)

I can't live without Fotor now!!!

I've been using Fotor for ages now, I recommend it to everyone I can, it's the most simple and easy to use photo app ever!!! I enhance all my photos before posting to Facebook now. Photo's taken on my iPhone seem dull unless I edit them in Fotor‚Ä¶ I have a very full Fotor folder in Finder, where I save all of my pics + collages! I can't fault this app whatsoever, it's sheer perfection.
AND I've just discovered there's an iPhone app, I'm now in complete photo fun heaven lol‚Ä¶
Thanks Fotor, keep up the amazing work :)

entry.title: LOVE IT!!
entry.content: I have been using Fotor for ages and i absolutely love it! It is very easy to use and gives great results. I also love the fact that it remembers the folder that you save to so you dont have to keep selecting it. I would recommend it to anybody that is starting out with photo editing, as it is really simple :)

LOVE IT!!

I have been using Fotor for ages and i absolutely love it! It is very easy to use and gives great results.
I also love the fact that it remembers the folder that you save to so you dont have to keep selecting it.
I would recommend it to anybody that is starting out with photo editing, as it is really simple :)

entry.title: I really like Fotor Photo Editor
entry.content: As an amateur who likes fiddling with photos I‚Äôve really enjoyed using Fotor Photo Editor. I‚Äôve only explored some of the features so far and look forward to exploring the rest. Have happily recommended it to others as it‚Äôs easy to use with lots of features.

entry.title: Good App
entry.content: I am a snapseed lover and this app rates closely to that one for me. Wasn‚Äôt sure at first but I am continuing to use it to greater effect. Highly recommend for quick affects for photos and collages. Easy to use. Now can I have that $50 itunes voucher as promised!

Good App

entry.title: Keeps Crashing

Everytime I open it, it crashes. I've restarted my MBP, and still crashes. I've reinstalled it, and still crashes.
So disappointing.

entry.title: excellent when it works!
entry.content: This app is really good when it doesn't crash! When working properly it applies excellent "instagram" type effects and enhances your average photos making them look stunning. Unfortunately it crashes when trying to save about 20% of edited photos. Worth it for the 80% it does manage to save successfully.

excellent when it works!

This app is really good when it doesn't crash! When working properly it applies excellent "instagram" type effects and enhances your average photos making them look stunning. Unfortunately it crashes when trying to save about 20% of edited photos. Worth it for the 80% it does manage to save successfully.

entry.title: Very simple to use
entry.content: The app is so easy to use - it doesn't take long to figure out what all the buttons and options are. Produces some great results.

Very simple to use

The app is so easy to use - it doesn't take long to figure out what all the buttons and options are. Produces some great results.
